Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.31778756] Gram-negative bacteria:P. aeruginosa (MIC = 64 μg/mL, MBC = 128 μg/mL);Gram-positive bacteria:S. aureus (MIC = 16 µg/mL, MBC = 64 μg/mL)
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: [Ref.31778756]P5 displayed less than 10% hemolysis in all the range tested (0-1024 μg/mL)
Sequence Information.Comments: This new peptide could be good candidates for future drug development for anti-biofilm and anti-infective therapy.

Literature.Title: Antibacterial, anti-biofilm and in vivo activities of the antimicrobial peptides P5 and P6.2
Literature.Reference: Microb Pathog. 2020 Feb;139103886. doi 10.1016/j.micpath.2019.103886. Epub 2019 Nov 25.
Literature.Author: Martínez M, Polizzotto A, Flores N, Semorile L, Maffía PC

Literature.Title: Antimicrobial activity of de novo designed cationic peptides against multi-resistant clinical isolates
Literature.Author: Faccone D, Veliz O, Corso A, noguera M, Martinez M, Payes C, Semorile L, Maffia PC
